description: Ecolomondo Corporation operates as a clean tech company in Canada. The company focuses on commercialization and implementation of thermal decomposition process using a pyrolysis platform that converts hydrocarbon waste into marketable commodity end-products, including carbon black substitute, oil, gas, and steel. It serves municipal waste facilities, landfill operators, licensees, entrepreneurs, waste processors, and recyclers. The company is headquartered in Saint-Laurent, Canada.
